m_szDocTitle: Toyota, BMW Power Up Fuel Cells Despite Cheap Oil | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
m_szDocSumamry: Toyota, BMW Power Up Fuel Cells Despite Cheap Oil Reprints Toyota Motor ( TM ) and BMW are reportedly discussing expanding their fuel cell partnership as Toyota continues its drive to make fuel cell cars mainstream. The news comes despite the low price of oil, which has ravaged sales of some fuel-efficient cars lately. In August, U.S. sales of Toyotaâ€™s Prius hybrid plunged 21%. BMW Chief Finance Officer Friedrich Eichiner said Tuesday at the Frankfurt Motor Show that talks between the companies will build on their existing alliance but will stop short of any kind of capital exchange, according
